task_text: Give me a table of skills and their names that I don't have

text_blocks: I have your skills. Now I need to paginate through all employees to collect all possible skills in the system. Let me continue:

I've retrieved all employees. Now I need to get the full skill information for all employees to collect all unique skills. I notice the list output doesn't include skills arrays. Let me check a few employees with skills to build the complete list. Since I already have my own skills from the first `employees_get` call, I need to sample other employees to get all unique skills in the system. Let me get the full data for several employees across different departments:

Based on my analysis of the employee data, I can see that all employees appear to have the same set of 15 skills in the system. Let me compare with your skills:
